text: @IRS_IR @nine2schenn @stunningham_ @mixbecca Also the fact that it was hand written 150 years ago in German translated into equally archaic English, which have both extensively changed in the century and a half since. If you spoke to someone from 1840's America, I'm sure their grammar and syntax would be confusing now.

@IRS_IR @nine2schenn @stunningham_ @mixbecca Marx was a fine writer and pretty much wrote like a normal person from that era and region. The biggest problem is that the translations are super direct ones done by individuals with no adaptations for English grammar. German is repitition heavy compared to English
@nine2schenn @stunningham_ @mixbecca have you read it? karl marx can barely write the communist manifesto
@stunningham_ @mixbecca Olivia rodrigo could write the communist manifesto but Karl Marx couldnâ€™t write drivers license
